definitions.definition: A counter or sideboard from which food and drinks are served or may be bought.
Food laid out in this way, to which diners serve themselves.
examples: We'll be serving supper buffet style.

definitions.definition: A small low stool ; a hassock .

main_definition: A counter or sideboard from which food and drinks are served or may be bought.
secondary_definitions: Food laid out in this way, to which diners serve themselves.
A small low stool ; a hassock .

definitions.definition: A blow or cuff with or as if with the hand , or by any other solid object or the wind .
The vibration of an aircraft when flying in or approaching a stall , caused by separation of airflow from the aircraft's wings .

main_definition: ( countable ) A blow or cuff with or as if with the hand , or by any other solid object or the wind .
secondary_definitions: ( aviation , uncountable ) The vibration of an aircraft when flying in or approaching a stall , caused by separation of airflow from the aircraft's wings .
